root.name: Dungeon Siege II: Broken World
root.description: OverviewExpansion to the 2005 action-rpg Dungeon Siege II. The expansion adds another act to the story and a new race: the Dwarves.PC System RequirementsOperating System: Microsoft® Windows® XP SP1 or newerProcessor: PC with 1.0 GHz equivalent or higher processorRAM Memory: 256 MBHDD Space: 4 GBGraphics Card: ATI Radeon™ series 7000 or better / Nvidia® Geforce series / Intel Extreme Graphics 82845, 82865, 82915Sound card, speakers or headphones required for audioMicrosoft Mouse or compatible pointing deviceBroadband Internet access or LAN for online play
